title: Combine Standard and Express workflows to Optimize for Cost and Performance
description: Order Request Workflow with Nested Standard and Express State Machines

introBox.headline: How it works
text: A mock e-commerce workflow that does selective checkpointing (Nested workflows). Deploying this sample project creates a Standard workflows state machine, a nested Express Workflows state machine, an AWS Lambda function, an Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue, and an Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic.
